name: Tavern Talk: Tempest Tantrum
storyline:
One and a half years after the events of Tavern Talk, young detective Melina finds a mysterious mechanism and breaks it, accidentally unleashing the chaotic spirit trapped inside. Melina and her friends must now race to fix the ancient apparatus, recapture the spirit, and stop a Primordial storm from causing devastating damage.

Meet Oleander Verifina!
Introducing Fable’s long suffering brother, the chronically overworked ranger of the Ashen Grove. Oleander wants nothing to do with any dangerous exploits, but fate has other ideas... Let's show him the best hospitality the Wayfarer’s Inn has to offer!

Discover a new recipe & infusion!
A new story brings a fresh breeze! Surf the turbulent waves of the tempest with the slightly frothy Ocean Fizz, and light up your mixtures with some Luminous Algae!

Multiple Endings
Tempest Tantrum adds roughly three hours of new story to your first playthrough. It also includes four unique endings and three individual quests.
